resources.string: Please Enter Your Mobile Number. We Will Be Sending A Six Code To Authenticate Your Account.
Please Enter The Six Digits Authentication Code That Was Sent To Your Mobile Number

By tapping “Continue”, your payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your subscription will automatically renew for the same package length at the same price until you cancel it in settings in the Google Play store at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. By tapping “Continue”, you agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms.

Welcome To WeMatchMake.com, Nigeria Number One Match Making Platform, Where We Use Advance Scientific Algorithm To Locate & Connect You To Your Marriage Partner & Soul Mate.

WeMatchMake Algorithm Is First Of Its Kind In Nigeria, Where We Use Your Personality, Preferences, Character, Traits, Like, Dislike, etc To Provide You With Compatible Suitors Of Nigerian Origin Both Home & Abroad, Giving You Multiple Choices Of Opportunity Of Finding Your Desired Marriage Partner.

On-like Other Apps That Creates An Open Chat Platform For Everyone, WeMatchMake.com Is Different & Unique.
We Match You Up With A 90% - 100% Compatible Marriage Partner/s.
This Simply Means That Any Match/s Provided To You Through Our Advance Algorithm, Has Met All Your Preferences And Your Profile Has Also Met The Preferences Of The Individual/s Matches As Well.
So It Is Advisable To Fill All Boxes As Accurate & Honest As You Can.
There Are No Wrong Or Right Answers....
Just Be Yourself... And Let Us Find Your Marriage Partner...
